# Ingredients
- 1 kg ground beef
- 1 yellow onion
- 1 small cabbage
- 860 ml diced tomatoes
- 240 ml tomato sauce
- 1/2 cup water
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2 tsp salt
- 1 tsp ground pepper

# Instructions
## 0.5 Prepare ingredients
- Use mandolin to roughly chop cabbage
- Roughly chop onion
- Mince garlic

## 1 Cook ground beef
- Heat a Dutch oven over medium-high heat
- Cook and stir beef and onion in the hot Dutch oven until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
- Drain and discard grease

## 2 Cook rest of ingredients
- Add cabbage, tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, garlic, salt, and pepper and bring to a boil
- Cover Dutch oven, reduce heat, and simmer until cabbage is tender, about 30 minutes
